SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mr. Todd R. Stefan’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope people are kinder, more loving, less selfish, and open to other points of view and ways of life…”

– Mr. Todd R. Stefan, High School Band Educator @NA_Schools @youngstownstate https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/people-kinder-more-loving-less-selfish-other-points-view/
